head.title: COVID Information – COVID Closure – Kelloggsville Public Schools

meta.name: description
meta.content: Kelloggsville Public Schools is a district that serves PK to high school in Grand Rapids, MI.

span.style: color: #00008b; font-size: 18pt
span.strong: KELLOGGSVILLE PUBLIC SCHOOLS BUILDINGS WILL BE CLOSED FOR THE REMAINDER OF THE SCHOOL YEAR.

span.style: color: #00008b; font-size: 18pt
span.strong: Please stay tuned for more details regarding the closure from Gov. Whitmer.

span.style: font-size: 18pt; color: #0000e0

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We hope that you are staying safe and healthy during this challenging time. At this time, you probably are aware of the most recent executive order given by Governor Whitmer ending all face-to-face education for the school year to prevent the spread of COVID-19.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Here at Kelloggsville Public Schools, we want to let you know that we are currently working on the best approach for our community in continuing to provide support for our students and community members. Below are key points that we have put together regarding the closure of our buildings and how we’re moving forward. As more details are finalized by our administrators, teachers, and staff; we will be reaching out as soon as we’re able.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We will begin distance learning instruction on April 27

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 0.6em; vertical-align: super

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: through June 3

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 0.6em; vertical-align: super

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: . Our instruction will be a hybrid approach of paper packets as well as online learning.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We are actively monitoring and working on what we can provide regarding honoring your accomplishments. At this time, it is not clear what action will be taken regarding the graduation ceremony. Once more information is available we will be reaching out to update you.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: All state assessments have been waived by the State and Federal Government, which includes SAT, & MSTEP, & ACT WorkKeys.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Please contact your specific AP teacher regarding courses and testing.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Our playgrounds are not open for use per Gov. Whitmer’s executive orders & by recommendation of the Kent County Health Department.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We will continue to provide this service with the same schedule that we have in place for the remainder of the year, including the week of Spring Break. This schedule is Monday, Wednesday, and Fridays from 11:30-12:30 at KHS.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Our Sinking Fund proposal is still scheduled for the May 5

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 0.6em; vertical-align: super

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: , that was voted on before the Coronavirus pandemic. Due to executive orders this election will be submitted via absentee ballot only. Those applications will be mailed directly to you from the Secretary of State. We are all trying to adjust to what is currently going on but the focus of our proposal is planning for the future of KPS. We believe that this proposal is necessary for us to continue to soar with opportunities for our students.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Please reach out to the building administration directly regarding those specific events and how they will be handled.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We will notify you when the buildings are open and available to pick up your student’s items that may have been left behind.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We want to thank you for your patience as we continue to work on how we can best serve our students and community during this unique situation.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Es nuestro deseo que usted y su familia se encuentren seguros y saludables durante estos momentos difíciles. Probablemente en este momento usted ya está al tanto de la orden ejecutiva más reciente dada por la gobernadora Whitmer que finaliza toda la educación presencial por el año escolar para evitar la propagación de COVID-19.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Aquí, en las Escuelas Públicas de Kelloggsville, queremos informarles que actualmente estamos trabajando en cómo abordar de la mejor manera y continuar brindando apoyo a nuestros estudiantes y miembros de la comunidad. A continuación, se presentan los puntos claves con respecto al cierre de nuestros edificios y cuáles serán nuestros próximos pasos. A medida que nuestros administradores, maestros y personal finalicen más detalles; nos comunicaremos tan pronto nos sea posible.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt
font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: Cambio al Aprendizaje Híbrido a Distancia

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Comenzaremos el aprendizaje a distancia el 27 de abril hasta el 3 de junio. Nuestra instrucción será un enfoque híbrido de paquetes en papel, así como el aprendizaje en línea.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt
font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Estamos monitoreando y trabajando activamente en lo que podemos proporcionar para poder honrar sus logros. En este momento, no está claro qué medidas se tomarán con respecto a la ceremonia de graduación. Una vez que haya más información disponible, nos pondremos en contacto para mantenerlos al día.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt
font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Todas las evaluaciones estatales han sido eliminadas por el gobierno estatal y federal, estas incluyen al SAT, MSTEP y ACT WorkKeys.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt
font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Comuníquese con su maestro de AP específico con respecto a los cursos y las pruebas.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt
font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Los patios y parques de las escuelas no están abiertos para su uso por orden ejecutiva de la gobernadora Whitmer y por recomendación del Departamento de Salud del Condado de Kent.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt
font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Continuaremos brindando este servicio con el mismo horario que hemos establecido por el resto del año, incluida la semana de vacaciones de primavera. Este horario es lunes, miércoles y viernes de 11:30-12:30 en KHS.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt
font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Nuestra propuesta del Fondo de Hundimiento todavía está programada para el 5 de mayo, lo cual se votó antes de la pandemia de Coronavirus. Debido a las órdenes ejecutivas, esta elección se presentará solamente mediante boleta en ausencia. Esas solicitudes serán enviadas directamente por correo de la Secretaría del Estado. Todos estamos tratando de adaptarnos a lo que está sucediendo actualmente, pero el enfoque de nuestra propuesta es planificar para el futuro de KPS. Creemos que esta propuesta es necesaria para que podamos seguir aumentando las oportunidades para nuestros estudiantes.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt
font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Comuníquese directamente con la administración del edificio con respecto a estos eventos específicos y cómo serán manejados.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt
font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Le notificaremos cuando los edificios estarán abiertos y disponibles para recoger los artículos que su estudiante pudo haberse olvidado.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Queremos agradecerles por su paciencia mientras continuamos trabajando en cómo podemos servir mejor a nuestros estudiantes y comunidad durante esta situación única.

span.style: font-size: 14pt

strong.span: Please see the below videos from the Kent County Health Department on things we should be doing during COVID-19 to stay safe & healthy.

span.style: font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 14pt

div.span: We are doing our best to keep this page up to date with any news or cancellations due to COVID. We will also be posting and keeping our Facebook (@kvrockets) Twitter, (@kvrocketsps) & Instagram (@kvrockets) up to date as well.

span.style: font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 14pt
font-size: 14pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif

span.span: Estamos hacienda lo posible para mantener esta pagina actualizada con cualquier noticia o cancelación por causa del COVID. También estaremos publicando y manteniendo nuestro Facebook (@kvrockets), Twitter (@kvrocketsps), e Instagram (@kvrockets) al día.

p.span: WE WILL CONTINUE TO PROVIDE THIS SERVICE DURING THE STAY AT HOME ORDER ISSUED BY GOV. WHITMER.

font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; color: #ee853a

span.span: : De 11:30 am - 12:30 pm los lunes, miércoles, y viernes hasta el 2 de junio, 2020.

p.span: Por favor utilice la entrada de la Avenida Division y conduzca hacia el área de despedir a los estudiantes. Los trabajadores estarán ahí con los desayunos y almuerzos.

span.span: : Los Padres/Tutores/Estudiantes pueden venir al KHS durante el tiempo indicado para recibir desayunos y almuerzos suficientes para dos días para todos los niños en su hogar.
